clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period required for contract termination.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.

clauses.title: Data Protection
clauses.summary: GDPR compliance required for all data processing.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs.
Renewal auto-renews unless cancelled 60 days before expiry.

evidence.snippet: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.
Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice.

clauses.title: Service Level Agreement
clauses.summary: 99.9% uptime guarantee with penalties for downtime.

clauses.title: Termination for Cause
clauses.summary: Immediate termination allowed for material breach.

insights.message: No liability cap for service interruptions.

evidence.snippet: Service availability shall be maintained at 99.9% uptime.

clauses.title: Data Security
clauses.summary: AWS responsible for infrastructure security, customer for data.

clauses.title: Usage Limits
clauses.summary: Monthly usage caps with overage charges apply.

insights.message: Standard AWS terms with clear responsibility matrix.

evidence.snippet: Customer retains control and responsibility for guest operating systems.

clauses.title: License Grant
clauses.summary: Non-exclusive license for internal business use only.

clauses.title: Usage Restrictions
clauses.summary: Prohibited from reverse engineering or redistribution.

insights.message: Standard software license with clear usage terms.

evidence.snippet: License is granted for internal business purposes only.

clauses.title: Data Processing
clauses.summary: GDPR compliant data processing with strict security measures.

clauses.title: Data Breach Notification
clauses.summary: 72-hour breach notification requirement.

evidence.snippet: Data processor shall notify controller within 72 hours of breach.

clauses.title: Support Level
clauses.summary: 24/7 premium support with 4-hour response time.

clauses.title: Escalation Process
clauses.summary: Three-tier escalation with direct access to engineering.

evidence.snippet: Response time guaranteed within 4 hours for critical issues.

clauses.title: Subscription Terms
clauses.summary: Monthly subscription with annual commitment discount.

clauses.title: Data Export
clauses.summary: Full data export available upon termination.

insights.message: Standard SaaS terms with favorable data portability.

evidence.snippet: Customer data remains accessible for 30 days post-termination.

clauses.title: Security Monitoring
clauses.summary: 24/7 endpoint detection and response monitoring.

clauses.title: Incident Response
clauses.summary: Immediate response to security incidents with forensics.

insights.message: No liability coverage for undetected threats.
Contract expired - security coverage at risk.

evidence.snippet: Provider liability limited to service fees paid.

clauses.title: Contact Limits
clauses.summary: Licensed for up to 10,000 marketing contacts.

clauses.title: Integration Rights
clauses.summary: API access for third-party integrations included.

insights.message: Standard marketing automation terms with scalable pricing.

evidence.snippet: Contact database limited to 10,000 active contacts.

clauses.title: Performance SLA
clauses.summary: 99.95% uptime with performance guarantees.

clauses.title: Backup & Recovery
clauses.summary: Automated daily backups with point-in-time recovery.

insights.message: Renewal pricing increases 20% from current rate.
